Hi I dont normally do a review but this game is just to amazing to let a slob do something if you want a mind teasing game that you can finish pretty fast or a game that you can play to have a laghe with a friend this is it this is one of my favorite games that will never go out of style
oooooooooooooh yeeeeeaaaaaaaah
great gameplay, interesting story, very funny.... hell if you want a puzzle game that gives you an enjoyable headach then this is the game for you.

As a person that was not entirely used to puzzle games before(or played the original before this),I can tell you you're gonna love this game :),even if you haven't played the original Portal.If I could go above 10 on a"out of 10"rating,I would give it an 11,it's that good! ^_^
Music is amazing(especially the credits,where every time I got to that point I sung along with it)
Humor is aplenty in the game and is one of my fav points about it and is one of the main things that kept me playing for 30+ hours :)
Characters are pretty likable(kinda going with the above thing about humor)(my fav personally being Wheatley,because at first he's your friend,and then towards the final 2 chapters he turns on you and is even the final boss,and there's even a nice little easter egg related to Wheatley on the main menu screen after you beat the game ^_^)
The puzzles are puzzling at first(especially starting at Chapter 6 The Fall),but the game has a nice learning curve so after a while of going through you won't get stuck much(heck my first time through I looked at guides on youtube because I kept getting confused at the puzzles,then after about my second time through I didn't have much trouble getting through them because I remembered whatever I did the first time I played through as a refresher in the chambers I got stuck on before)
And for those that want to play the game with a friend,there's a co-op  mode added,with about 5 courses,about 20 chambers each(which like in singleplayer are challenging your first time through),with a new story behind it too(which explains the 2 robots with GLaDOS in the ending of singleplayer)
Anyway,I highly recommend this game,again even if you haven't played the original,and I'm sure you're gonna love it! ^_^
10/10 from me :)
Best coop game on steam.
best game of all time

9 out of 10

(Note: Both Portal and Portal 2 are excellent games.  If you haven't done so already first play Portal) 

Portal 2 is a surprisingly fun puzzle game.  Use a portal-gun to link two places in space together to solve a series of puzzles. 

The good: 
1. Solve some imaginative puzzles.  Not like Chess or Soduko, you solve by trial and error. 
2. A lot of funny chirps.  The game is not quite as funny as Portal and some of the humor seems forced. 
3. More puzzle elements than Portal. 

The bad: 
4. Most of the achievements are not for the main game. 

The ugly: 
5. Like Portal, Portal 2 is quite short.  I do feel though that if the game was longer it would have spoilt.
Pierwszy Portal był grą dobrą , Portal 2 daje o wiele więcej treści, wprowadze nową mechanikę żeli, zagłebia się w ciekawą i zwariowaną fabułę must-have.
I LOVE THIS GAME

Portal 2 is a very fun game.

10/10 I recommend this game.
Great co-op game. If you like 3d puzzles this is a must have
Génial mais jouer d'abord au Portal 1 même sil est un peut moins bien, au moins vous comprendrez l'histoir !

This game is like a luxury meal. It's an amazing experience, but it doesn't last very long and you can't really eat it again.

But that shouldn't discourage you from playing it. It's really good fun with the perfect mix of story, comedy, puzzle-solving, and action. 

The story takes about 6 hours blind and once you've done all the chambers, heard all the jokes, and know the plot twists they kind of lose their magic a second time round, but still. 

Do play. Good game.

Торт врёт!

Je vous le recommande!

[h1]파티 에스코트 자세를 취해주셔서 감사합니다[/h1]

침묵의 여주인공 첼과 실험광AI 글라도스의 두번째대결 입니다. 전작의 공포스러운 분위기와 두 히로인 체재에서  조금 모자란 남주(?) 휘틀리를 추가하여 한층 즐거운 분위기와 동시에 묘하게 얽히고 설키는 삼각관계에서 새로운 스릴을 즐기십시오! 

[list]
    [*][h1]분위기[/h1]:  차가우면서 냉혹한 실험실 분위기를 잘 표현했다. 특유의 미스테리하고 공포스러우면서 (휘틀리 덕분에)유머러스한 분위기가 너무 좋았다.
    [*][h1]스토리[/h1]:[b]최★고였다[/b]. 기계주제에 귀엽고 인간미 넘치는 캐릭터과 함께 지낸 시간이 정말 즐거웠다. 게임이 끝난후에도 강한 여운을 남기고 밸브의 무수한 떡밥들로 인해 계속 곱씹어보고 파헤치는 재미가 있다. 어느새 모든 캐릭터들의 위키 페이지를 정독하는 당신을 발견하게 될 것이다!
    [*][h1]게임성[/h1]
[h1]싱글[/h1]:전작에 비해 더 다양해진 실험 도구들로 계속 반복되는 퍼즐임에도 매번 달라지는 해결방식과  소소한 이벤트들로 지루하지 않았다. (중간중간에 글라도스의 [strike]모욕[/strike]독설을 듣는 것도 재밌다) 싱글을 끝내도 스팀 창작마당에 있는 퀄리티 좋은 유저 실험실로 게임을 계속 이어갈 수 있다
[h1]멀티[/h1]:두명의 플레이어가 협동을 통하여 싱글과는       색다른 재미를 느낄 수 있다. 친구와 함께 하는것도 좋다.그러나 자칫 우정파괴 게임이 될수도;; 무엇보다 싱글 때의 첼과 동시간대의 일이라는게 흥미롭다. 도중에 재밌는 일이 많이 일어난다.

[H1]10/10 나의 최고의 게임[/h1]

[B]지금 당장 여러분의 라이브러리에 소장해야 합니다!!![/b]

+밸브가 다시 한번 이런 몰입력있는 싱글을 만들어주었으면 하는 바램이...

One of the greatest Valve games and often on sale on steam. Beautiful dark graphics with a wonderful and slightly disturbing storyline if you look into it. With the added feature of co-op in the second in the franchise as well as the level  creator this is a truly wonderful game, and one that valve should be very proud of. It is definitely one of my favourites.

Naprawdę dobra gra, jest o wiele dłuższa od pierwszej części. Grafika do tej pory dobrze wygląda. Gra wykorzystuje silnik Source. Grywalność gry jest na bardzo dobrym poziomie. Udźwiękowienie gry jest też na dobrym poziomie. Zawiera tryp kooperacji, dzięki któremu można pogłówkować ze znajomym. Tryb dla jednego gracza trwa ok. 10-12 godz. Polecam tą grę !
Grafika - 9
Dźwięk - 10
Grywalność - 9
Ocena ogólna - 9

Wow! I played through the Portal 1 campaign in about two hours, but Portal 2 has taken me at least 4x as much time to complete. Not only was the story line compelling, but the use of speed and bounce gels brought something new and fresh to the game. The character Wheatley really brought a sense of life to the game as well, with an unexpected plot twist (caused by wheatley greed for power) to mess with your mind. I highly recommend this game who liked Portal.

Прошёл и понял, что геймплей стал ещё более интересный: Локации стали более красочными, продуманными и мнтересными. Сюжет стал более понятным. Ну, а редактор уровней вообще забрал у меня добрые - много часов (к сожалению играл в оффлайне и сохранить уровни не получилось :О) В общем игра стоит своих денег и вашего времени.

This game introduces a whole new story to the original game's amazing puzzles. With it's colorful characters, it's a great game. I love it! Then the Co-Op mode introduces more replayability as you help new players into the game.
Отличная игра! прошел на одном дыхании!

Loved every aspect of this game. The sound design in my opinion was really well done. The concept is original. The game is simple yet complex at the same time. A perfect balance. This is one game you don't have to think twice about. Give it a shot... You'll not regret it. (:
very challenging
Самая крутая головоломка, но хотелось бы продолжения!

Pra falar a verdade, sempre tive curiosidade de saber como era esse jogo. Via uns loucos pulando pra la e pra ca, corredores escuros, robos brancos, etc. Nao me chamava tanta atenção.... nem cheguei a ir atras de gameplay e mto menos saber do que se tratava o jogo. Mas teve uma promoçao louca , tava barato demais, comprei.

O jogo é muito legal. Mesmo nao tendo jogado o 1, nao fiquei perdido na historia do 2. Pra quem tem duvida de como é o jogo Portal, basicamente vc esta numa sala, e precisa sair dela. Mas para isso, deve resolver varios puzzles usando apenas tua portal gun. O que ela faz ? Simples, além de agarrar pequenos objetos, abre 2 portais, um de entrada e outro de saida. Nestes portais, pode atravessar vc, objetos, raio lazer.... Vc nao sai matando ninguem, apenas deve tomar cuidado com alguns robozinhos que ficam de sentinelas, que ao te ver, ja atiram em vc. Mas eles ficam parados....Vc pode abrir um portal em cima deles pra jogar um objeto neles, e derruba-los rsss. Voce pode baixar salas feitas por outros jogadares, bem como criar a tua, ou seja, sempre terá salas novas. No Portal 2, vc pode jogar com um amigo *_*. 

É um jogo velhinho. Nao recomendo estando no preço cheio. Mas numa promoçao de uns 70 %, vale a pena comprar. Lembrem-se que usa a engine source. Devem olhar na lista e ver se possuem algum jogo source compativel.
10/10

Digo sin miedo a equivocarme que este es uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. La continuación del exitoso juego experimental ''Portal'' es lo que en su día fue el primero pero con un resultado mucho más complejo y elaborado. El original juego creado por Valve esta vez tiene un modo cooperativo aparte de la campaña, divertidísimo para jugarlo con un amigo y picarse a ver quien encuentra el resultado a un puzzle primero.

Portal 2 sigue siendo tan divertido como en su día lo fue ''Portal'', incluso más ya que en esta ocasión incluye mecánicas jugables nuevas para resolver puzzles los cuales por otra parte son más complejos y difíciles que el primero. Te puedes quedar bastante rato pensativo en un puzzle, pero acaba siendo un reto divertido y hace que no quieras ver un vídeo para pasar cierta parte, lo cual hace el juego más largo y incita a pensar. El juego se desarrolla bastantes años más tarde que el primero, despertamos de un largo sueño y nuestro principal objetivo es escapar de el complejo de pruebas de Aperture Science, lugar en el que transcurrió también el primer ''Portal''. Los gráficos son buenos para el 2011, se nota que utiliza el motor gráfico ''Source'' el cual sigue cumpliendo y actualmente sigue siendo bonito. Utiliza el mismo sistema de físicas que utilizó su predecesor con la novedad de que en esta ocasión también hay físicas para los fluidos. También mantiene el formato de narrar el juego sin ''cutscenes'', pero en esta ocasión hay una ''cutscene'' que aparece al final del juego. Como su predecesor sigue sin agobiar con tutoriales, simplemente en ocasiones puntuales te explica que hace cada tecla, pero lo hace de manera muy discreta sin llegar a ser pesado. En este juego hay más diálogos que en el ''Portal'' original, pero igualmente siguen siendo brillantes y con un gran doblaje al español. Otro punto fuerte de esta segunda parte es el carisma de todos los personajes, todos son muy interesantes y tienen una personalidad muy marcada. La jugabilidad sigue siendo muy original, si bien ya no sorprende tanto como el primero sigue siendo divertidísima y entretenida.

Portal 2 es para mí una obra de arte, un juego muy divertido con una historia excelente y un gran sentido del humor que te hará sacar más de una sonrisa. Un juego de diez, un obligado del gaming de PC y, porque no, también de consola. Espero que disfrutéis esta saga tanto como yo lo hice en su día, ojala me lo pudiera volver a pasar por primera vez xD.

Очень классная и атмосферная игрушка, прошел её наверное за часов 7-8 не более. Остальное время наиграли со знакомым проходя совместные миссии, в принципе игра доставила удовольствие, в тоже время как и не большие психи о том как пройти этот гребанный уровень. Сюжет классный, но не много однообразный. После прохождения всех миссий как в сингле так и в мультиплеере есть дополнительные миссии что очень классно. Если то что мне сказали правда, то можно те карты которые люди придумывали сами, это же огромный плюс этой игры. Эту игру можно проходите вечно.
This has to be one of the best puzzle games I have played in a long time.

Uno dei migliori giochi mai provati, Portal 2 è sicuramente un Must Have per tutti coloro che adorano i puzzle.
Vi ritroverete nei panni di una giovane donna, imprigionata a fare test su un dispositivo crea-portali, che deve fuggire dal laboratorio.

Nel multiplayer invece vi ritroverete affiancati ad un amico per risolvere differenti "camere" (così si chiamano) che da soli sarebbero impossibili.

Molto interessante anche l'opportunità di scaricare mappe fatte dalla comunità, sia per single che multiplayer, spesso anche create usando pacchetti di mod per inserire oggetti o texture nuove.

P.S. Se volete capire affondo la storyline consiglio di giocare prima a Portal.
one of the best first person game other then minecraft!
This game has the most awesome storyline and gameplay and makes you think while having hard actionfilled levels. I give this game 7/5!
Portal 2 exceeds every expectation. It has a smart story, hilarious dialogs and the most refined multi-dimensional puzzles ever created.
Gr8
Histoire original sur le moteur graphique de Half-Life, a ne pas louper !!
Great logic puzzle!Recommend this game for all!
